mapper.select: SELECT gongguReviewId, m2.name, g.content, g.regDate, g.gongguProductId, g.memberId, g.showReview, g.answerId, g.answerDate, g.answer, p.gongguProductName, g.rate FROM gongguReview g JOIN member1 m1 ON g.memberId = m1.memberId JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId JOIN gongguProduct p ON g.gongguProductId = p.gongguProductId ORDER BY g.regDate DESC
